description: This table stores billing activity history action-specific data. Every time a billing activity (ATM) is performed on a record or group of records, an activity history record (BFH) is logged. These activity history records store specific data related to each action that was performed on the activity. Each action (and its related data) is logged as a line in related group BFH 300. This table is specifically for actions performed on liability buckets (HLB).

columns.name: BFH_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the billing activity history record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:

columns.name: ACT_BDC_RECORD_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the denial/correspondence record type category ID that is created as a result of this bucket action.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Denial


Remark


Correspondence


Underpayment


Overpayment

columns.name: ACT_BDC_RECEIVED_DATE
columns.description: This column stores the denial/correspondence record received date that is set as a result of this bucket action.

columns.name: ACT_BDC_RECORD_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the denial/correspondence record source category ID that is set as a result of this bucket action.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Payment Received


Correspondence Received


Zero Allowed Amount


Expected Allowed Amount Updated


Reserved for future use


System Auto Action Claim Denied


PB Follow-up Automatic Activity


RAC Correspondence


ADR Correspondence


HH Pre-Claim Review


Transferred In

columns.name: ACT_BDC_INVOICE_NUM
columns.description: This column stores the denial/correspondence record invoice number that is set as a result of this bucket action.

columns.name: ACT_BDC_AMOUNT
columns.description: This column stores the denial/correspondence record amount that is set as a result of this bucket action.

columns.name: ACT_BDC_REMIT_CODE_ID
columns.description: This column stores the denial/correspondence record reason code ID that is set as a result of this bucket action.

columns.name: ACT_BDC_REMIT_CODE_ID_REMIT_CODE_NAME
columns.description: The name of each remittance code.

columns.name: ACT_BDC_IMAGE_MNEM_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the denial/correspondence record image mnemonic category ID that is set as a result of this bucket action.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ACT_BDC_IMAGE_KEY
columns.description: This column stores the denial/correspondence record image key that is set as a result of this bucket action.

columns.name: ACT_SURCHARGE_OVERRIDE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the type of surcharge override performed during a billing activity (ATM) action. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


System


User


Ins Pmt

columns.name: ACT_OUTLIER_AMOUNT
columns.description: The outlier amount that is set as a result of this bucket action.

columns.name: ACT_ADDON_AMOUNT
columns.description: The add-on amount that is set as a result of this bucket action.

columns.name: ACT_XR_OVERRIDE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of expected reimbursement override that was performed during this bucket action.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


System Calculated


Contract Overridden


Expected Amounts Overridden


Overridden by Wisdom Estimate

columns.name: ACT_OVERRIDE_ICN
columns.description: This column stores the internal control number that is set as a result of this bucket action.

columns.name: ACT_PMT_RECON_REPORT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The report type category ID that was set through this bucket action.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.description: Documents the changes in the settlement number.

columns.name: ACT_NRP_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the next responsible party type performed as part of this activity.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


EOB Amount


Fixed Amount


Remaining Bucket Balance

columns.name: ACT_EXPECTED_ALLOWED_AMT
columns.description: The expected allowed amount used for this action.

columns.name: ACT_PAYER_ALLOWED_AMT
columns.description: The payer allowed amount used for this action.

columns.name: ACT_USE_PREV_CLAIM_DATA_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether we are using data from the previous claim for this billing activity. Yes (Y) means we are reusing previous claim data, No (N) means we are not.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: ACT_TOB
columns.description: The override Type of Bill used by the billing activity.

columns.name: ACT_PROCESS_IP_PART_B_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the billing activity processed the claim as an Inpatient Part B claim. Yes (Y) means the claim was processed as Inpatient Part B, No (N) means it was not.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ACT_USE_PREV_CLAIM_DATA_YN

columns.name: ACT_CLM_CHNG_COND_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The claim change reason code category ID for the billing activity.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ACT_NRP_AMOUNT
columns.description: This column stores the next responsible party amount.

columns.name: ACT_COPAY_AMOUNT
columns.description: Stores the copay amount

columns.name: ACT_DEDUCTIBLE_AMOUNT
columns.description: Stores the deductible amount

columns.description: Stores the coinsurance amount

columns.name: ACT_NON_COVERED_AMOUNT
columns.description: Stores the non-covered amount

Stores whether the user chose to resubmit the resulting bucket's claim after the action completes 


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ACT_USE_PREV_CLAIM_DATA_YN

columns.name: ACT_PROC_ID

 Category Entries:

Stores whether the user chose to post a contractual adjustment for closed buckets alongside the action


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: ACT_USE_PREV_CLAIM_DATA_YN

columns.name: ACT_REFUND_CUSTOM_PAYEE_ID

columns.name: ACT_REFUND_CUSTOM_PAYEE_ID_AGENCY_NAME

columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the coverage for where to send the refund for the Post Refund bucket action.

columns.name: ACT_REFUND_PAYER_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the payer for where to send the refund for the Post Refund bucket action.

columns.name: ACT_REFUND_PAYER_ID_PAYOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the payor.

columns.name: ACT_REFUND_PLAN_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the plan for where to send the refund for the Post Refund bucket action.

columns.name: ACT_REFUND_PLAN_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME

columns.name: ACT_ADDR_NAME

Stores the category value of the state/province in a country for an address specified in a billing activity action


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ACT_ADDR_ZIP_CODE
columns.description: Stores the zip code for an address specified in a billing activity action

columns.name: ACT_ADDR_HOUSE_NUMBER
columns.description: Stores the house number for an address specified in a billing activity action. This may be blank for some addresses.

columns.name: ACT_ADDR_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the category value of the county for an address specified in a billing activity action


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ACT_ADDR_DISTRICT_C_NAME

May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ACT_ADDR_COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description:

columns.name: ACT_TRANSFER_FROM_BUCKET_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier of the source bucket when transferring a denial/correspondence record.

columns.name: ACT_PMT_RECON_NON_CVD_AMOUNT

columns.name: ACT_ADDL_NRP_AMT
